CSSImportRuleLayerName.summary: The read-only layerName property of the interface returns the name of the cascade layer created by the {{cssxref("@import")}} at-rule.

remarks.para:
If the created layer is anonymous, the string is empty (""), if no layer has been
created, it is the null object.

CSSImportRuleLayerName.value: A string, that can be empty, or the null object.
